remarks: Definition of function, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
dffun6f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
dffun6f.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
dffun6f $p |- ( Fun A <-> ( Rel A /\ A. x E* y x A y ) ) $.
$d x y $.
